display_long_description:
Vion Runners is an adrenaline-fueled VR experience that drops you into the wild as a powerful, agile primate. Using cutting-edge gorilla locomotion mechanics, players move through the environment with their hands—swinging from trees, climbing rocky surfaces, and vaulting through dense jungle terrain with full physical control. Every motion is designed to feel natural and visceral, bringing the raw, physical intensity of being a gorilla to life like never before.

Whether you're exploring vast, open jungles, racing against friends in intense multiplayer time trials, or navigating intricate obstacle courses, Vion Runners offers a deeply immersive experience built around freedom of movement. The game’s lifelike physics, responsive hand-tracking, and smart environmental design encourage creativity in how you traverse the world—no paths, no rails, just you and the wild.

Multiplayer modes let you compete or cooperate with other players online, while solo challenges test your speed, precision, and endurance. With customizable avatars, unlockable skins, and ongoing updates that expand maps and features, Vion Runners is built for both casual jungle explorers and hardcore VR athletes alike.

Step into the body of a jungle runner. Feel the momentum, master your movement, and dominate the canopy. Vion Runners isn’t just a game—it’s a new way to move.
